metadata.title: CVE-2024-40990 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/mlx5: Add check for srq max_sge attributemax_sge attribute is passed by the user, and is inserted and usedunchecked, so verify that the value doesn't exceed maximum allowed valuebefore using it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
